New Records: Anrich Nortje and Kagiso Rabada's partnership helped South Africa win by 18 runs against USA.
Aiden Markram scored 46 runs for South Africa before getting out.
Quinton de Kock scored 74 runs for South Africa before getting out.

Pre-Game Insights: USA win the toss and bowl first
Aaron Jones says after calling the coin correctly. “We’re going to go with the extra spinner,”
Aidan Markram admits he wasn’t entirely sure what to do had he won the toss. “We would also have leaned towards bowling but we’re not too bothered with the result of the toss.”
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa hold off USA to win by 18 runs at T20 Cricket World Cup – as it happened
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA's Shayan Jahangir catches out South Africa's Quinton de Kock during their T20 World Cup 2024 Super Eight match.
The Antigua pitch should suit the batters a bit more, but will by no means be a road.
Others: The USA cricket team obviously did.
South Africa are their opponents today, the Proteas have won all of their games… but not without incident.
